item.title: Video Editor - Documentaries Famous Celebs - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a passion for editing Celebrity Documentaries ? Do you want to create the highest quality videos possible and be part of a young and driven team? Then we have the dream job for you!

We are looking for an experienced video editor with proven experience to video edit videos about documentaries for our YouTube channel.

Requirements:
1) Capable of using multiple editing styles
2) Capable of using real interviews/footage
3) Switch music often and add music in line with the feeling and flow of the story
4) Clear communication

Job Info:
A) 15-20 minute edit
B) You work closely together with our video edit manager
C) Personal training to enhance your skill set
D) 2 videos a week

Budget:
A) $18 per video
B) Bonus structure by excellent work

Advantages:
A) Unlimited earning possibilities
B) Free training
C) Bonus opportunities

Budget: $18

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Looking for a CapCut short-form video editor (30-100 videos/week). Management via ClickUp and Slack - Upwork
item.description:
We receive a lot of one-minute user-generated videos (talking heads) from our customers. Up to 100 a week and growing. All of these videos must be edited in our pre-defined style.

We're looking for a reliable video editor who can help us create the videos and become a part of our team. Initially, we'll pay you per video. And if it works, we'd be happy to hire you full time.

Requirements:
- Great english and eye for mistakes in subtitles
- Proven track record in short-form video editing
- Native in CapCut (you  must REALLY know this tool)
- Experienced with ClickUp, Slack, Google Suite

The purpose of this job post is to see if you:

- Are able to follow the instructions and re-create the quality we need
- Have the right feeling for jump cuts, zooms, etc. (that's the part where you can be really creative)
- Can deliver each video in a reasonable amount of time. Template creation takes around 25 minutes (done once). Then, subsequent videos take between 10–20 min, incl. export.
- Are easy to work with. Clear communication. Hitting deadlines. Ability to use our tech and follow SOPs

All of these factors will be considered when making a decision about who we hire.

Application process:
1. Watch this video about our template walkthrough to find out if you can do this: https://www.loom.com/share/ae5eefae89b04d7aa79d8693da559630
2. As you apply, answer all 3 questions (applications without the answers are automatically disqualified)
3. We will pick 5 best applicants in 24-48 hours
4. Then, we do a paid test assignment ($20) in which you re-create our template using our instructions
5. Then, we'll hire the best person, while considering all factors listed above

Timeline:
- Application deadline: June 24
- Test assignment deadline: June 26
- Offer made to one person: June 26
- Tools training & access: June 26/27
- Job starts: June 27

Budget:
- Test assignment (5 people only): $20
- One video edit (after hiring): TBD

Good luck!



Posted On: June 22, 2024 15:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Slack, ClickUp, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: CapCut, Slack, ClickUp, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: AI Promo Video For Conference - Upwork
item.description:
Need a video created from AI that shows the entire process of our team from beginning to end. So this will be a reenactment of what a day of a financial advisor is for our firm.

For example:  Financial Advisors name is Joe.  Joe is waking in his house, has a modern home with lots of tech. Joe wakes up and says Good Morning Rosey, what's on my agenda for today. Rosey is similar to Siri or Alexa. Rosey resonds with the appointments he has on his calendar for the day.

For example: Rosey says Good Morning Joe - Today on your schedule you have a meeting with Sally and Ryan in Fort Lauderdale. Your appointment time is at 1 PM, Traffic is clear but you should expect your drive time to be about 30 minutes.

To prepare for your meeting, Sally and Ryan have about 750,000 in assets and are looking for growth and income for the rest of their life. They also want to discuss legacy plans. Sally and Ryan also own their own outright. They have no outstanding debts and both will be looking to retire within the next year.

While this is all happening, he will be standing in his kitchen drinking his coffee.

Then we can go into the scene of the advisor driving to meet the client and also go through the meeting with the client.

Would love to get feedback and some thoughts on the timeline of getting a project like this done and what is needed to do so.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:52 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video
Skills: AI-Generated Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create 30 dropshipping videos for tik tok in french - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative TikTok video creator to produce 30 engaging and high-quality videos for our dropshipping products. These videos will be used for organic marketing on TikTok, aiming to attract, engage, and convert potential customers.

Responsibilities:
Create 30 engaging TikTok videos showcasing our dropshipping products.
Develop creative concepts and ideas for each video to capture the attention of our target audience.
Edit and optimize videos for TikTok, ensuring they meet platform standards and trends.
Collaborate with our team to understand the key features and benefits of each product.
Use trending sounds, hashtags, and effects to increase video reach and engagement.
Requirements:
Proven experience in creating TikTok videos, preferably for e-commerce or dropshipping products.
Strong understanding of TikTok trends, features, and best practices.
Excellent video editing skills using tools like Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop unique and compelling video content.
Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with our team.
Portfolio or examples of previous TikTok videos created.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in the dropshipping or e-commerce industry.
Familiarity with TikTok analytics and performance tracking.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Deliverables:
30 TikTok videos, each 15-60 seconds long.
Videos should be optimized for TikTok organic reach, using trending sounds, hashtags, and effects.
Final videos delivered in TikTok-compatible formats.
How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal including:

A brief introduction of yourself and your experience with TikTok video creation.
Links to your portfolio or examples of TikTok videos you have created.
Your proposed timeline for completing the 30 videos.
Your rate for this project.
We look forward to seeing your creativity and how you can help us bring our products to life on TikTok!

I want videos like that :

https://www.tiktok.com/@luvellery
https://www.tiktok.com/@bucavi
https://www.tiktok.com/@elcongroo__official
https://www.tiktok.com/@shopfabulove
https://www.tiktok.com/@herzschmuck.ch
https://www.tiktok.com/@rosalove.fr
https://www.tiktok.com/@sensaroma.usa
https://www.tiktok.com/@wonder.love.paris
https://www.tiktok.com/@pinkorashop
https://www.tiktok.com/@milona_paris

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, French, Videography
Skills: MP4, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, French, Videography
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Top Amazon Video Editor with VFX Skills For Youtube Shorts etc - Upwork
item.description:
Please read this fully because its a unique deal for a new up and coming talented editor.

We're looking for someone who can create us 3+ viral quality shorts per week to make our Amazon SAAS explode!

We own a pretty popular Amazon SAAS company. What you'll be in charge of is producing viral videos to expose our SAAS.

You might have subjects like "This is how I made a fortune selling trainers on Amazon FBA"

Then I can show you some features on our software that could be exposed but I want it all to feel natural I dont want the videos to force advertise the software. I want more fun viral videos that feature our software a little or sometimes not even mention it but make people ask in comments what it is etc.

So let me discuss the deal with you its not your standard deal. This deal is based on performance.

$1500 will be paid for every 100 clients you bring us so every 100 new subscribers to our software you will be given $1500 we can also release half at 60 clients. We're looking for someone long term someone to join the team and be part of th team. Our success is your success and creating viral videos is the bet way to drive traffic to our website for sales. If this project interests you let me know !

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Campaign Highlight Case Study Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team on a freelance basis. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, strong storytelling skills, and the ability to transform campaign highlights and metrics into compelling 10-second, 30-second, and 1-minute case study videos.

Responsibilities:
* Review and analyze campaign highlights and metrics provided by the team.
* Edit and assemble raw footage into polished, engaging case study videos.
* Create 10-second, 30-second, and 1-minute versions for each campaign.
* Add appropriate graphics, animations, and music to enhance video quality.
* Ensure videos align with our brand guidelines and objectives.
* Collaborate with the team to incorporate feedback and make revisions as needed.
* Deliver high-quality videos within agreed timelines.

Requirements:
* Proven experience as a video editor; show us that PORTFOLIO!! Similar work preferred.
* Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
* Ability to understand and interpret campaign metrics and turn them into engaging visual stories.
* Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.
* Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:
* Experience in creating case study videos or similar promotional content.
* Knowledge of motion graphics and animation is a plus.
* Familiarity with social media platforms and video requirements for different channels.

To Apply:
Please submit your resume, a link to your portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you are a good fit for this role. Include examples of past work that highlight your skills in creating short-form case study videos.

We look forward to seeing your application!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Testimonial Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor: High Level Design for YouTube Channels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an exceptional Editor to join our crew full time. You will be responsible for a variety of projects, bringing them to life from concept to delivery.  You will be designing and editing YouTube clips and remis to IG, TikTok etc.

YouTube video edits have to be designed extremely well (you can use templates or design your own). think Futr from a design level point of view.

You can also use AI tools.

Ideally you have at least 3-5 years of experience in a similar studio environment. Relevant qualifications will be highly regarded.

Essential skills:

- Highly skilled with Premiere

- Comfortable with After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator

- Intuition for storytelling, tone and pace to effectively bring the creative concept to life

- Ability to carry projects from concept to delivery

- Strong communication, organisation and time management skills

- Solid understanding of post-production process

- Adept technical knowledge of formats and delivery (across social media, digital and broadcast)

Hourly Range: $15.00-$24.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.ns0:encoded:
We are looking for an exceptional Editor to join our crew full time. You will be responsible for a variety of projects, bringing them to life from concept to delivery.  You will be designing and editing YouTube clips and remis to IG, TikTok etc.

YouTube video edits have to be designed extremely well (you can use templates or design your own). think Futr from a design level point of view.

You can also use AI tools.

Ideally you have at least 3-5 years of experience in a similar studio environment. Relevant qualifications will be highly regarded.

Essential skills:

- Highly skilled with Premiere

- Comfortable with After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator

- Intuition for storytelling, tone and pace to effectively bring the creative concept to life

- Ability to carry projects from concept to delivery

- Strong communication, organisation and time management skills

- Solid understanding of post-production process

- Adept technical knowledge of formats and delivery (across social media, digital and broadcast)

Hourly Range: $15.00-$24.00

item.title: Social Media Video Creator / Video Model for Planner Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a dynamic and enthusiastic video creator/model to produce engaging 15-30 second UGC-style videos promoting our planner. These videos will be showcased on our website, social media platforms, and used in online advertisements.

Who You Are:

A creative individual with a passion for planning and product promotion.
Experienced in creating authentic and relatable UGC-style videos.
Bonus (optional): You have a social media presence and understand how to create content that resonates with audiences.

What You’ll Do:

Develop and create high-quality, engaging 15-30 second UGC-style videos.
Highlight the features and benefits of our planner in a captivating and authentic way.
Use your creativity to make our planner stand out in the digital space.

What We’re Looking For:
Examples of your previous work (please provide links or portfolio).
Your rates for creating 15-30 second videos.
Enthusiasm for digital planning products.

Possibility for More Work: Successful collaboration may lead to additional projects and ongoing work opportunities.

If you’re a social influencer or video content creator model with a knack for creating compelling, UGC-style content, we want to hear from you! Join us in making the world more productive (and happy).


Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:31 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Advertising, UGC, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Advertising, UGC, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
